TopicTitle: Notice the girl Kerbals are always talking?

Articles.Content:
![gi4x1gJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/gi4x1gJ.png)

Just watch them - constant chat, chat, chat. 

Good job women aren't like that in real life, uh? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
I haven't seen any of them chatting. Some of them open mouths in awe, just like Jeb and others...

What? As far as I know there's no animation that resembles talking.

> 
> I haven't seen any of them chatting. Some of them open mouths in awe, just like Jeb and others...

Which is what's happening in the "example" OP used.
They have the BadaS flag set, which leads to "awe" like Jeb. No need for derogatory statements like that.

> 
> I haven't seen any of them chatting. Some of them open mouths in awe, just like Jeb and others...

Oh, that's odd. Wonder if its only when there's more than one Kerbal in a pod?

> 
> Good job women aren't like that in real life, uh? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Oh man, such a quality post. Thanks for your contribution~ to the forums!

> 
> Oh man, such a quality post. Thanks for your contribution~ to the forums!

Oh, come on! Lighten up. Its only a little harmless fun.

Yeah this is going to go nowhere nice in a hurry.

Closed.
